mapper.insert: INSERT INTO useroperation (uId ,operationType ,operationId ,parentType ,parentId,createTime) SELECT #{uId} ,#{operationType} ,#{operationId} ,#{parentType} ,#{parentId} ,#{createTime} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM useroperation WHERE operationType=#{operationType} AND operationId=#{operationId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM useroperation WHERE uId = #{uId} ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT opt.* FROM useroperation opt WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{nDay} DAY) <= createTime AND opt.uId IN(SELECT user_relation.toUserId FROM user_relation WHERE user_relation.fromUserId=#{myuId} AND user_relation.relationType=10 ) ORDER BY createTime DESC
